divs: Sighting Detailsi saw a bright light in the sky not even 500ft in the air, its light was the size of a airplane but it was just 1 big ball of light & it was moving fast, i know it wasnt a airplane bc it moved in a zigzag motion as it ascended & i saw it in the air for only a few min. then in a blink of a eye it just vanished it was moving towards the ne in grand rapids, mi where i live. it was my first sighting & now i look up at the stars everynight hoping to see it again
Summary: it was bright & it moved in a zigzag motion
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Grand Rapids
There was one other sighting in Grand Rapids on or around June 7th 2012
